english.segment1: (Verse 1). Father true and merciful. Bound to me with love. Adopted in free from all sin
english.segment2: Jesus Saviour glorified. Your offering none could give. I stand before You humbled and in awe
english.segment3: (Pre-Chorus). And all. To You God. For all You are to me
english.segment4: (Chorus). There is nothing like. There is nothing like. Your Love. Your Love
english.segment5: (Verse 2). Holy Spirit gift of God. Teach my soul to soar. Train me in Your Holy ways oh Lord
english.segment7: (Bridge). I love you forever. I love you forever. I love you forever Lord
